title: Dead Man's Chest: Travels after Robert Louis Stevenson
description: Follow the footsteps of Robert Louis Stevenson in a thrilling and meticulous travelogue that retraces his journey from Edinburgh to the South Seas - where he died in Samoa at the age of just 44. A deliciously gossipy and beautifully researched book."Rankin is a wizard...a natural sleuth, writes well in slim nuggety paragraphs, and he teaches us a great deal about Stevenson en route." - Vogue."Delightful...the ideal book to take with you on holiday." - Independent.
author: Nicholas Rankin
